reviewText: The Mirror Has Two Faces in one of my favorite light romantic comedies.  Streisand and Jeff Bridges are great together and the story line is just fun.  Prince of Tides was a tremendous book and surprisingly, a great movie.  And, of course, The Way We Were is a classic.  To have all three of these in one set at a good prices was too good to pass up!
My favorite is The Mirror Has Two Faces which is why I purchased this DVD - great value - good movies!
I DON'T KNOW HOW I MISSED SEEING THIS GREAT MOVIE.  LOVE BARBARA STRIESAND AND JEFF BRIDGES.  A GREAT CHICK FLICK.
Love this movie, have seen it many times.
Movies were all great tearjerkers & they arrived quickly and in great condition! Thank you!
The movies are all good and all play well

Quality is very good, but not quite  blue ray quality.  I have only watched Prince of Tides, and enjoyed it very much.  It's rather startling seeing Nick Nolte and Barbra Streisand looking so young.  .
This is a great movie set. We very much enjoyed this set and have watched it several times. A must have for any DVD collection.  I highly recommend it.
Excellent Condition
Great movie; will watch it more than once.
Great buy, great movies.
Great movies!

Video review: Goes straight into playing without DVD menu

Movie review: I only bought this for The Mirror Has Two Faces, which I love. This marriage first, love story second premise is a bit of a stretch but entertaining. This story slowly shines as you see how they both take their own path to realize they are capable of having a loving relationship. Totally sappy, and surprisingly funny, but that's the whole point.

The Way We Were: This movie is so retro, Hollywood probably thought they were the first to discover that SOME girls have brains too. Its a long movie to take seriously, but one might enjoy the historicity of attitudes of people in the 70's
Love anything Barbara stars in. Plus the great leading men.

Love the movie but the DVD is faulty. It screwed up the ending by jumping to other parts of the movie and left out a few scenes. Had to buy another movie to  be able to see the entire movie.
Love this set.  Even though I have seen them all before, they are very good movies.  They are kind of classic:  somewhat chick-flick but good stories for middle agers especially.
The movies in this collection are always difficult to find in stores. Now we can have Barbara movie night at home.

If you are a Streisand fan - you have to own these three movies ... profound movies that reflected many of the issues of the moment in society - a definite must have for your DVD collection :)
This was a Christmas gift for someone else but they enjoyed it very much. If you are a Striesand fan this is a great package to buy. Surely these are her 3 best movies.

Love these movies!! Thank you.  These are exactly what I was hoping for,  Love Barbara, she is fabulous.

My nieces and I really loved them.  It took a while to get the movies but love them when we got them.
Great combo of movies. I am a huge fan of all the stars and The Way We Were is one of my all time favorites, as is The Prince of Tides. I would highly recommend this combo to anyone!
Very good.  Love having 3 movies all in one package.  Good quality - good movies.  Would recommend to others.  Very good product.

These three movies are a must for any movie collector.  All three are very good to excellent movies guaranteed to entertain.  Good for a "Girls Only Weekend", or just watching with your significant other or just all by yourself!! Music is great as well.  You will not be disappointed.

I had been searching all over Perth, WA (Australia) for "The Prince of Tides" on DVD but to no avail. Then I came across your website - yahoo!! and three movies for the price I paid was insane! sadly the two other disks "the Mirror has two faces" and "The way we were" aren't readable on my player but Im stoked I finally got the copy of the movie I was really chasing in the first place. Thank you Amazon, I will be back.

I ordered this three-pack of Barbra Streistand movies thinking it was a good deal.  I could not remove the subtitles from "The Way We Were" and the Spanish subtitles from "The Mirror Has Two Faces."  I tried and tried and it was annoying to watch these films with subtitles - English and Spanish.

I have watched The Mirror Has Two Faces and The Prince of Tides many times and decided I wanted them for my collection.  The Way We Were is one I have never seen but I find Barbra Streisand to be a very fascinating character in all of her movies.  I use to only view her as a singer but she is quite the actress and producer as well.  She is a gem to treasure.  This triple feature is priceless.

My son needed the dvd for "Prince of Tides" for a school independent reading project (comparing the book to the movie made from the book...he needed a physical copy of the book, and we don't do enough movies to subscribe to Netflix.)  Since We've lost all of our video retail stores around here, we only have the "Blockbuster Express" and "Red Box" at our grocery stores.  They don't cut it on finding older classic movies like this, but Amazon came through for us and we had the dvd the next day after ordering it.  Fantastic movies, fantastic service, darned good price.

Three terriffic Barbara Streisand movies at a great price.
